means: （观点、目标或争议）不可调和的，不相容的

sentence.Network_en: This view is irreconcilable with common sense.
These practices are irreconcilable with the law of the Church.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种做法与教规是相悖的.

sentence.Network_en: Many commentators consider Ruiz irreconcilable with the Chenery line of cases.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多评论家认为,"鲁兹"案和"彻内里"一类的案件势不两立.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'implacably hostile'): from in- + reconcilable

entry.def: If two things such as opinions or proposals are irreconcilable, they are so different from each other that it is not possible to believe or have both of them.

example.tran: 两种对立立场的不可调和性

example.ex: These old concepts are irreconcilable with modern life.
example.tran: 这些陈旧的观念与现代生活格格不入。

entry.tran: 不可调和的;无法消除的
entry.def: An irreconcilable disagreement or conflict is so serious that it cannot be settled.

auth_sentence.content: Senior military leaders believe the Haqqani movement is irreconcilable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Senior military leaders believe the Haqqani movement is irreconcilable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Senior military leaders believe the Haqqani movement is irreconcilable.

auth_sentence.content: He said the conflicting interests are at times irreconcilable.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said the conflicting interests are at times irreconcilable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said the conflicting interests are at times irreconcilable.

auth_sentence.content: "These two things are irreconcilable," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "These two things are irreconcilable," he said.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不能妥协的,不能和解的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不+reconcilable[adj.可和解的, 可调和的]→adj.不能妥协的,不能和解的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可和解的, 可调和的
stems_affixes.word_buile: reconcile[v.使和好,调解,使调和;[to,with]使一致]+able可以……的→adj.可和解的, 可调和的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 政务会, 理事会, 委员会
使和好,调解,使调和;[to,with]使一致
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再+con共同+cil召集+e→[双方]再次召到一起→和解

means.word_mean: (观点、目标或争议)不可调和的,不相容的

sentences.cn: 一场似乎无法化解的冲突

sentences.en: These practices are irreconcilable with the law of the Church.
sentences.cn: 这种做法与教规是相悖的。
